title: Wild Republic Snake Plush, Stuffed Animal, Plush Toy, Gifts For Kids, Butterfly Glitter 54
features: Slither around to great new adventures with the adorable, butterfly-printed Boa stuffed animal from Wild Republic.
Being able to curl up or stretch out, this plush toy measures out to be 54 inches when fully extended.
This pink and blue Boa stuffed animal is a memorable addition to the life of any child or adult.
Messes are no match for this plush toy because it is made of high-quality materials that are surface washable.
Detail is what sets this realistic stuffed animal from the rest, take a look and you will see what we’re talking about.
description: The Boa is a widely recognized reptile as one of the strongest and smartest snakes. You will be able to find these slithering creatures in Central and South America. They love warmer clients and prefer to hunt at night with skills they’ve had instinctually since birth. Sneaking up on prey and swallowing them whole leaves the stomach acid of the Boa to truly digest the food. Depending on the size of the food, it can go weeks after without eating. They’re reptiles that never stop growing from birth to the 20 to 30 years spent slithering around Earth. Wrap up in cuddles with this lifelike stuffed toy version of the amazing Boa that has fun and welcoming colors. It makes for the perfect birthday gift for kids or a unique gift for adults. Wild Republic has been developing plush animals and educational toys for kids of all ages since 1979, with a specialization in realistic stuffed animals.
Slivery slimy colorful plush snakes. A whopping 54" long. Hot colors. Large heads to really give you a great time. Made of high quality fabrics.
